description: Details required for Condition 3 (Construction Management Plan), 4 (hours of working), 6 (Fire Safety Strategy), 7 (landscaping scheme), 11 (drainage design), and 15 (secure cycle parking) of planning permission 21/00975/FUL (Demolition of detached chalet bungalow and erection of 2no. semi-detached family dwellings, with associated parking provision and cycle and refuse storage facilities)
decision_conditions: Due to the absence of key information as  identified in the Officer Report  relating to the scope and requirements of the Construction Management Plan, Landscaping scheme and Drainage Design planning conditions, it is considered that insufficient information has been submitted to discharge the requirements of  the following planning conditions:- Condition 3 (Construction Management Plan)  to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and in the interests of safety and operation of the highway network  in accordance with policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021, and policies CS7, DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012- Condition 7 (Landscaping Scheme) to ensure a satisfactory appearance  on completion of the development in accordance  with  policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012- Condition 11 (Drainage Design)  does not meet the requirements of Policy SI 13 of London Plan (2021)  and drainage calculation have not been provided to demonstrate that flooding will not occur on any part of the site for a 1 in 30 year rainfall event or any part of a building during a 1 in 100 year rainfall event as  as set out in Sustainable drainage non-statutory technical standards (DEFRA, 2015)
